item.title: Google's Professional Cloud Security Engineer Certification
item.description: Introduction # Earlier this year, my team was provided access to a training budget for Google Cloud Platform that we could use in various ways to purchase classroom trainings or licenses to Google’s on-demand training platform, Cloud Skills Boost as well as a number of exam vouchers that could be used on various GCP certification exams.

item.title: Building on GCP
item.description: Recently, I had to complete a project that involved running the open source tool Cloudquery to create an inventory of resources in a GCP organization.
